name: ✝️ True Cross
shortDescription: The Wood of Ultimate Sacrifice and Redemption
fullDescription:
The Wood of Ultimate Sacrifice and Redemption The True Cross (Latin: Vera Crux) is the actual wooden cross upon which Jesus Christ was
                    crucified at Golgotha outside Jerusalem, according to Christian tradition. It represents
                    the physical instrument of humanity's redemption—the intersection of divine justice and
                    mercy, where God's son died to atone for human sin.
